description: Defines a UI component named 'NotesList' which manages and displays a list of notes, allowing creation, selection, and deletion, with references to external services and theme styles.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component displaying and managing a list of notes, with UI elements for adding, selecting, and deleting notes.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note or 'Untitled' if not present.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Returns the formatted last updated timestamp of a note or empty string if parsing fails.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a note row based on selection.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates vertical position of a note item in the list.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Returns trash icon background color based on hover state.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Sets hover index for the trash icon.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover index for the trash icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover state when mouse enters the add button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Handles hover state when mouse leaves the add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Updates selected note ID and emits a selection event.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Handles note deletion with a confirmation timeout, updating selection accordingly.
